title: Withdraw Funds
destinationLabel: Will be sent to your account
disclaimer: Withdrawals may take 24 to 72 business hours to appear in your bank account.

security.reason: Confirm your identity to authorize the withdrawal of funds.

success.title: Request Received
success.message: Your withdrawal is being processed. We will notify you when the money is on its way.

errors.insufficient: You do not have enough funds to withdraw that amount.
